content:
Namaste! I'd be happy to help you find a yoga studio near your office that offers lunch break classes.

To give you the best recommendations, could you please provide me with some more information?

1. What city or area is your office located in?
2. What are your preferred yoga styles (e.g. Hatha, Vinyasa, Restorative, Yin, etc.)?
3. Are you looking for a specific duration for the lunch break class (e.g. 30 minutes, 45 minutes, 1 hour)?
4. Do you have any specific days or times in mind for the class (e.g. Monday, Wednesday, Friday at 12:30 PM)?
5. Are you open to trying out different studios or do you have a particular studio in mind?

Once I have this information, I can provide you with some personalized recommendations for yoga studios near your office that offer lunch break classes.
